## Private Member Functions

### encodeStackAdjustment() {#ac9f5d60b72d8d6be83b972dbcf25b013}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AArch64AsmBackend.cpp&#125;::DarwinAArch64AsmBackend::encodeStackAdjustment (uint32&#95;t StackSize) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Encode compact unwind stack adjustment for frameless functions.

See UNWIND&#95;ARM64&#95;FRAMELESS&#95;STACK&#95;SIZE&#95;MASK in compact&#95;unwind&#95;encoding.h. The stack size always needs to be 16 byte aligned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/mctargetdesc/aarch64asmbackend-cpp/#l00593">593</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/mctargetdesc/aarch64asmbackend-cpp">AArch64AsmBackend.cpp</a>.
